title: RAG Metadata for Content Chunk
description: A metadata object for a chunk of repository content intended for retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). This contains details about the file source, content characteristics, and AI-enriched summaries to aid in effective retrieval.

source_path.description: The full file path of the source document from which this chunk was derived.

language.description: The detected programming language or content type of the file (e.g., csharp, razor, javascript, text).

chunk_index.description: The sequential index of this chunk relative to the full file content.

content_summary.description: A brief, AI-generated summary of the content in this chunk to help with retrieval.

keywords.description: A list of keywords or tags extracted from the content that aid search relevance.

entities.description: A list of named entities (such as person names, organization names, or technologies) discovered in this chunk.

created_date.description: An ISO 8601 formatted date-time representing when the chunkâ€™s underlying content was created (if available).

additional_context.description: Optional additional context or notes that may be relevant for retrieval or disambiguation purposes.
